com.cyc.km.query.answer.justification

Class ProofViewJustification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.km.query.answer.justification.ProofViewJustification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Justification

    public class ProofViewJustification
extends Object
implements Justification
    A Justification backed by a ProofView. Generally, a new ProofViewJustification object is constructed, parameters are set as desired, then populate() is called to flesh it out. Then you can get its root note (via getRoot()), and display it as an interactive tree structure.

    • Nested Class Summary
